sql_fr_run: with tmp (select cur_cnt/metric*100 as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt, 'Unit' as field_name from com_us_hub.txn_redist_sls sa where sa.aud_upd_dts >= date_add(date_trunc('DD',current_date),-1) and upper(sa.franchise_nm)='IMMUNOLOGY') cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where rule_key = 100121) prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name) select * from tmp

with tmp (select cur_cnt/metric*100 as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt, 'Unit' as field_name from com_us_hub.txn_dir_sls sa where sa.aud_upd_dts >= date_add(date_trunc('DD',current_date),-1) and upper(sa.franchise_nm)='IMMUNOLOGY') cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where rule_key = 100122) prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name) select * from tmp

with tmp (select cur_cnt/metric*100 as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt, 'Unit' as field_name from com_us_hub.txn_udef_order_adjs sa where sa.aud_upd_dts >= date_add(date_trunc('DD',current_date),-1) and upper(sa.franchise_nm)='IMMUNOLOGY') cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where rule_key = 100123) prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name) select * from tmp
select case when metric > threshold then 1 else 0 end as res from corp_us_lake.dq_output_table where entity_id in ('dq_imm_121','dq_imm_122','dq_imm_123')
